sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya ingin menjadi insinyur di masa depan.
english translation: "I want to become an engineer in the future."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kami sedang dalam pembicaraan melalui panggilan interlokal.
english translation: We are currently in a conversation via interlocal call.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya memerlukan internet untuk bekerja.
english translation: I need internet to work.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya telah membeli iPhone baru.
english translation: "I have bought a new iPhone."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Tolong belikan saya isi pensil untuk pensil mekanik saya.
english translation: Please buy me a pencil refill for my mechanical pencil.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya membeli isi steples baru untuk stapler saya.
english translation: I bought a new staples refill for my stapler.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Istana Negara terletak di Jakarta, Indonesia.
english translation: The National Palace is located in Jakarta, Indonesia.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya bermimpi untuk mengunjungi Italia suatu hari nanti.
english translation: I dream of visiting Italy someday.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Iya, saya setuju dengan pendapatmu.
english translation: Yes, I agree with your opinion.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya harus mendapatkan izin masuk kembali untuk kembali ke negara ini.
english translation: I need to get a re-entry permit to return to this country.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya harus memeriksa jadwalku sebelum memberikan jawaban.
english translation: I need to check my schedule before giving an answer.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya menyukai jagung panggang.
english translation: I like grilled corn.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Jahe dapat digunakan sebagai bahan alami untuk menyembuhkan sakit kepala.
english translation: Ginger can be used as a natural ingredient to cure headaches.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya hidup di Jakarta, ibukota Indonesia.
english translation: I live in Jakarta, the capital of Indonesia.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya memakai jaket karena cuaca dingin.
english translation: "I wear a jacket because of the cold weather."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Harus memakai jaket keselamatan saat bekerja di lokasi konstruksi.
english translation: Must wear safety jacket when working on construction sites.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kemacetan di jalan layang sangat parah pada jam sibuk.

english translation: I have to cross a big highway to reach the destination.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Berapa jam sekarang?
english translation: What time is it now?

sentence in indonesian using the words: Jam dinding di ruang tamu tidak berfungsi.
